content: दमः [दम् भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Taming, subduing. {@--2@} Self-command, subduing or curbing the passions, self-restraint; <ls>Bg. 10. 4</ls>; (निग्रहो बाह्यवृत्तीनां दम इत्यभिधीयते). {@--3@} Drawing the mind away from evil deeds or curbing its evil propensities; (कुत्सितात्कर्मणो विप्र यच्च चित्तनिवारणं स कीर्तितो दमः). {@--4@} Firmness of mind. {@--5@} Punishment, fine; <ls>Ms. 9. 284</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">290</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 293</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 4.</ls> {@--6@} Mire, mud. {@--7@} Viṣṇu. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of a brother of Damayantī. --मः --मं <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} A house, home. {@--2@} The inmates of a house.
